attributes.additional_details:
We, the residents of Putney, consider Simon Wright part of the Putney picturesque character, positively adding to the atmosphere of the place.

We admire his begging skills and demand a pardon for him (and his dog) so that he can return back to Putney to start begging again.

The fact that he does own a flat in Fulham worth ca. £300,000 only proves how good he has become at begging.

Please consider this petition as a proof of the good will of people of Putney who are sincerely missing their favorite beggar.
